TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
Do you remember the old acquaintance you helped me look for?
Do you remember the old acquaintance you helped me look for?
Do you remember the old acquaintance you helped me look for?
Do you remember the old acquaintance you helped me look for?
How could I forget? We wandered all over Northern Kor looking for somebody you wouldn't describe to me.
How could I forget? We wandered all over Northern Kor looking for somebody you wouldn't describe to me.
How could I forget? We wandered all over Northern Kor looking for somebody you wouldn't describe to me.
How could I forget? We wandered all over Northern Kor looking for somebody you wouldn't describe to me.
I received a message from them this morning. They wish to meet with me.
I received a message from them this morning. They wish to meet with me.
I received a message from them this morning. They wish to meet with me.
I received a message from them this morning. They wish to meet with me.
This old acquaintance, would it be something to do with this Liandra I heard you talking about?
This old acquaintance, would it be something to do with this Liandra I heard you talking about?
This old acquaintance, would it be something to do with this Liandra I heard you talking about?
This old acquaintance, would it be something to do with this Liandra I heard you talking about?
Yes... it does. But talking to them might be dangerous. Would you accompany me?
Yes... it does. But talking to them might be dangerous. Would you accompany me?
Yes... it does. But talking to them might be dangerous. Would you accompany me?
Yes... it does. But talking to them might be dangerous. Would you accompany me?
Of course I will. Where are we going?
Of course I will. Where are we going?
Of course I will. Where are we going?
Of course I will. Where are we going?
North of here, to Sartek's Maze. When we get there, they will contact us.
North of here, to Sartek's Maze. When we get there, they will contact us.
North of here, to Sartek's Maze. When we get there, they will contact us.
North of here, to Sartek's Maze. When we get there, they will contact us.
Then let's go.
Then let's go.
Then let's go.
Then let's go.
